PD.description: Prisoner's Dilemma: Classic dilemma where mutual cooperation pays but defection tempts individually.

HawkDove.description: Hawk-Dove (Chicken): Resource contest; Dove=cooperate-like (share), Hawk=defect-like (aggress, risky).

StagHunt.description: Stag Hunt: Coordination game; Stag=cooperate-like (high mutual), Hare=defect-like (safe solo).
